Stretch before and after workouts to prevent injuries and reduce soreness.
Hold each stretch for at least 20-30 seconds for optimal muscle elongation.
Focus on dynamic stretching during warm-ups and static stretching after workouts.
Include hip flexor stretches to improve lower body mobility.
Use resistance bands for deeper, more effective stretches.
Calf stretches prevent tightness and improve ankle mobility.
Side bends stretch the obliques and torso.
Chest stretches improve posture and reduce tightness.
Hip circles enhance hip mobility and flexibility.
Standing side stretches target the torso and spine.
Perform neck stretches to reduce tension and improve mobility.
Hamstring stretches enhance flexibility and reduce tightness.
Quadriceps stretches loosen up the front of the thighs.
Child's pose gently stretches the lower back and hips.
Perform shoulder stretches to increase range of motion.
